1._title: Would you prefer a refurbished device over a new one?

options.a: I would prefer a refurbished device

2._title: Is sustainability more important to you than the latest design or top performance?

options.a: Sustainability is more important to me
options.b: The latest design is more important to me
options.c: Top performance is more important to me
options.d: I focus on good value for money

3._title: Would you sell or give away a device instead of letting it sit unused?

options.b: I would give away a device
